name: spo-export-site-usage-reports
title: Get Site Usage Reports And Export It To CSV
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to get all site collections with usgae information and Export to CSV.
longDescription: In This script sample, first we will connect to the SharePoint admin site, get all site collections with usgae information and export it to CSV with all required details.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
